snippet.title: Indies' Lies Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Indies' Lies is a single-player game with Roguelike elements that takes deck building as the core gameplay.

The game has a multi-chapter plot content. With the progress of the game, you will get to know the world under the influence of old and new gods according to the gradually unlocked plot.

_______________________________________________
